title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.8 - Conduct of the arbitration proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.8 - Conduct of the arbitration proceeding

State Regulations

The conduct of the arbitration proceedings shall be under the
exclusive jurisdiction and control of the arbitration panel. The conduct of the
arbitration panel shall conform to applicable law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
205.8

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
